title: We Offer Advice To A Listener Who Knows About Her Friend's Affair + Bobby Gets Tricked At A Restaurant + Someone On The Show Made Bobby Some Money
itunes:title: We Offer Advice To A Listener Who Knows About Her Friend's Affair + Bobby Gets Tricked At A Restaurant + Someone On The Show Made Bobby Some Money
description:
A listener calls in needing advice after a friend has informed her of an affair. Should she tell her friend’s husband? Bobby went to a restaurant over the weekend with his sister and felt like he got tricked. Plus, Bobby shows appreciation for someone on the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
